命旦夕に迫る: (めいたんせきにせまる) - to be on the brink of death
命有っての物種: (いのちあってのものだね) - While there's life, there's hope
命脈: (めいみゃく) - life; thread of life
命辛々: (いのちがらがら) - for dear life; barely escaping alive
命辛辛: (いのちからがら) - for dear life; barely escaping alive
命長ければ恥多し: (いのちながければはじおおし) - (proverb) to live long is to outlive much; the longer you live, the more shame you suffer
命題論理学: (めいだいろんりがく) - propositional logic
命題関数: (めいだいかんすう) - propositional (sentential) function
咀嚼: (そしゃく) - chewing/mastication/breaking into bite-sized pieces; digestion/assimilation
咀嚼力: (そしゃくりょく) - chewing power; chewing strength; bite strength; masticatory strength; strength of mastication
咀嚼筋: (そしゃくきん) - muscle of mastication
咄々: (とつとつ) - (tongue) clicking; groaning; exclamation of surprise
咄す: (はなす) - to talk/to speak/to converse/to chat; to tell/to explain/to narrate/to mention/to describe/to discuss; to speak (a language)
咄咄: (とつとつ) - (tongue) clicking; groaning; exclamation of surprise
咄嗟に: (とっさに) - at once; right away; promptly; on the spur of the moment
和: (wa/yawa/nago) - peace , sum; harmony, peace; Japan, Japanese-style
和え: (あえ) - (when a suffix, follows a word indicating the type of dressing)  food with dressing on it (e.g. salad)
和え物: (あえもの) - chopped fish, shellfish or vegetables, dressed with (miso or other) sauce
和ぎ: (なぎ) - (ant: 時化・1) calm (at sea); lull
和して同ぜず: (わしてどうぜず) - harmonize but not agree (harmonise)
和する: (わする) - to get along; to add (one's own concordant voice, etc.)
和む: (なごむ) - to be softened; to calm down
和める: (なごめる) - to calm; to soothe; to quiet; to appease
和やか: (なごやか) - mild; calm; gentle; quiet; harmonious
和らぐ: (やわらぐ) - to soften; to calm down; to be mitigated
和らげる: (やわらげる) - to soften; to moderate; to relieve
和上: (わじょう) - (おしょう only)  preceptor or high priest (esp. in Zen or Pure Land Buddhism); (かしょう only)  preceptor or high priest (in Tendai or Kegon Buddhism); (わじょう only)  (usu. 和上) preceptor or high priest (in Shingon, Hosso, Ritsu or Shin Buddhism); second highest priestly rank in Buddhism; (おしょう, かしょう only) monk (esp. the head monk of a temple); master (of one's art, trade, etc.)
和了: (ホーラ) - {mahj} (sometimes read あがり) winning (chi: húle)
和人: (わじん) - Japanese person (term esp. used in ancient China, etc.)
和人ども: (わひとども) - you (familiar or derog.; usu. plural)
和人地: (わじんち) - Edo-period realm of the Japanese (as opposed to the Ainu) in southern Hokkaido
和僑会: (わきょうかい) - (e.g. 北京和僑会, 香港和僑会) association of overseas Japanese merchants
和光同塵: (わこうどうじん) - (yoji) mingling with the world by hiding one's true talent or knowledge; living a quiet life by effacing oneself
和冦: (わこう) - Japanese pirates (of the Middle Ages)
和協: (わきょう) - harmonious cooperation; close cooperation
和合: (わごう) - harmony; concord; agreement; unity; union
和同開珎: (わどうかいほう) - Japan's first circulated coinage (minted in 708 CE)
和名: (わめい) - Japanese name (often of plants and animals, and written in kana)
和名抄: (わみょうしょう) - Wamyoruijusho (famous Heian-period Japanese dictionary)
和唐紙: (わとうし) - thick Japanese paper resembling Chinese paper (from late Edo period onward)
和国: (わこく) - Yamato; ancient Japan; name by which Chinese rulers used to call Japan
和声的短音階: (わせいてきたんおんかい) - harmonic minor scale
和妻: (わづま) - branch of ancient Japanese magic tricks inherited mainly from oral tradition
和子: (わこ) - son of a person of high social standing
和定食: (わていしょく) - Japanese-style set menu
和封筒: (わふうとう) - Japanese-style oblong, open end envelope
和尚: (oshou) - preceptor or high priest (especialmente no Zen ou no Budismo da Terra Pura); preceptor or high priest (in Tendai or Kegon Buddhism) , preceptor or high priest (esp. in Zen or Pure Land Buddhism); preceptor or high priest (in Tendai or Kegon Buddhism); preceptor or high priest (in Shingon, Hosso, Ritsu or Shin Buddhism); second highest priestly rank in Buddhism
和布: (ワカメ) - wakame (species of edible brown seaweed, Undaria pinnatifida)
和布蕪: (めかぶら) - thick wakame leaves, from near the stalk
和平交渉: (わへいこうしょう) - peace talks; peace negotiations
和平会談: (わへいかいだん) - peace conference; peace talks
和平協定: (わへいきょうてい) - peace agreement; peace accord
和平合意: (わへいごうい) - peace accord; peace agreement
和平工作: (わへいこうさく) - (yoji) peace initiative; peace overture
